newsitem.title: USA: ITT Industries says Goulds tender complete.
newsitem.headline: ITT Industries says Goulds tender complete.

text.p: ITT Industries Inc said Friday it acquired 94 percent of Goulds Pumps Inc's common stock through its recently completed tender offer.
The company said about 2.3 million Goulds shares, or about 94 percent of Goulds' shares outstanding, were tendered before the close of the offer Thursday.

ITT Industries said it will merge Goulds with one of its units. Any Goulds shareholders who did not participate in the tender by the deadline are eligible to receive $37 per share in cash for their Goulds holdings, the company said.
